description.overview: Instincts represents your sense of meaning, spiritual connection, inner knowing, and creative flow.
description.detailed: This group combines four instinctual dimensions: Vision (life direction and meaning), Flow (spiritual belonging and unity), Intuition (inner guidance and awareness), and Creativity (creative flow and self-expression). Together they show your overall instinctual and creative state. High scores mean you feel aligned with your vision, spiritually connected, intuitively clear, and creatively flowing. Low scores suggest feeling lost, isolated, cut off from intuition, or creatively blocked.

quiet.challenging: Meaning feels distant right now - that's part of the journey. The answers are forming even when you can't see them
quiet.mixed: Intuition is quiet today - subtle signals are still signals. Trust the slow knowing
quiet.harmonious: Peaceful inner alignment - the stillness itself holds meaning. Rest in it

mild.challenging: Direction is unclear - be gentle with yourself. Searching is its own form of progress
mild.mixed: Gentle exploration happening - you're both seeking and finding. Neither is wrong
mild.harmonious: Soft connection to purpose - alignment comes without forcing. Follow the pull

moderate.challenging: Creative and spiritual blocks are real - but they break. Keep showing up and they'll crack
moderate.mixed: Active inner process - seeking and discovering at once. Trust that both are moving you forward
moderate.harmonious: Strong alignment with intuition and creativity - trust what you're sensing. It's reliable today

high.challenging: Deep questions are surfacing - this is uncomfortable but it's growth. The answers are coming
high.mixed: Intense inner transformation - breakdown and breakthrough happen together. You're not falling apart, you're reorganizing
high.harmonious: Profound connection to purpose and creativity - rare clarity. Act on what you know

extreme.challenging: This feels like a dark night - and dark nights end. You're being rebuilt for something bigger
extreme.mixed: Massive inner upheaval - chaos and revelation at once. You're strong enough to hold both
extreme.harmonious: Complete alignment - purpose, intuition, creativity all flowing. This is your moment. Trust it fully
